title: 5 Charged with Stalking, Harassing, Spying on US Residents for PRC Secret Police
description: Two complaints were unsealed, and one amended complaint was authorized today in federal court charging five defendants with various crimes related to efforts by the secret police of the Peopleâ€™s Republic of China (PRC) to stalk, harass and spy on Chinese nationals residing in Queens, New York, and elsewhere in the United States.
